channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other problem, 13th August
item.description:
ENWD Debris in CW Residue tarmac left in the CW Please Clear Standard TM - Footway Closure - Alternative Footway Available (Looks to be from a resurfacing of road: 'Far Sandfield' please see photo) (Debris/Obstruction in CW)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 13th August
item.description:

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other problem, 13th August
item.description:

item.title: A previously reported problem at this locality has now got considerably worse, see photo. Big ivy bush has now come across almost entire width of Glos CC public rights of way, and also has an active wasps nest within it. Young mothers and children will no longer be able to access this route to get to the nearby school, and also risk being stung., 13th August
item.description:
In lane running alongside north of Lakeside School field, behind Hazebrouck Close.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Hazebrouck Close, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 13th August
item.description:
Customer reports that the culvert that runs across the road at this location appears to be blocked, possibly with tree roots. Issue is obvious at the moment as there is a large amount of standing, stagnant water on the property, but the drainage ditch on the other side of the road that is connected via this culvert is empty and clean.
Report on FixMyStreet
